Key Match Events: Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter
Houston overcame a 20-point first quarter â€” the fewest points allowed by last-place Washington in a period this season
Washington's 18 turnovers led to 35 Houston points, the most a Wizards opponent has scored directly from giveaways this season
Post-Match Reflections: Corey Kispert scored 23 points and Jonas Valanciunas added 18 in the Wizards' third straight defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Poole missed his second straight game with a bruised left hip, and fellow starter Kyle Kuzma exited at halftime with a bruised right calf
Others: The Rockets improved to 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents
Amen Thompson scored 20 points and grabbed 15 boards
